title: CivCity: Rome

notes:
It initially had no text in the menus.  I used WineTricks to install MS corefonts and copied them from the /home/username/.wine/drive_c/windows/Fonts
folder to the
steamapps/compatdata/3980/pfx/drive_c/windows/Fonts
folder.
